sys_properties.description:
The scoped GlideSystem API has a gs.debug() method. By default, the scoped GlideSystem debug() method does not write to the Application log when the gs.debug() method is used in a script. To enable the gs.debug() method, create or modify the application property with the name syntax <app_scope>.logging.verbosity. Set the Value field in the <app_scope>.logging.verbosity property to debug to log debug messages from the gs.debug() method to the Application Log. For all other log levels, set the Value field to a comma-separated list of desired log levels. Do not use spaces in the Value field. For example:
info,warn,error
sys_properties.name: x_58872_needit.logging.verbosity
